name: Alluring View B&B
description: Welcome to Alluring View B&B and cabins, located on a flat mountain top at 4200-ft elevation in the Blue Ridge Mountains of North Carolina.  Our accommodations welcome guest to these majestic mountains from our location at the edge of Linville Gorge, about 3 miles from the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway, and 8 miles from Grandfather Mountain, in the area of Jonas Ridge.  On a clear day, this rustic log cabin bed and breakfast has 100 mile views! There is a long range mountain view out of EVERY window, and your delicious full breakfast is prepared by a professional chef. We strive to provide comfortable lodging at affordable rates.
